alfredsnippet.snippet:
# list tar file
tar tvf filename.tar.xz

# compress, auto detect suffix
# BECAREFUL!!! DONOT RUN 
# tar caf file1 file2 ... compress.tar.xz
# else file1 will be OVERWRITE!!!
tar caf compress.tar.xz file1 file2 ...

# decompress. auto detect suffix
tar xaf compress.tar.xz
alfredsnippet.name: tar
